reviewText: The movie is decent. Weber is wonderful and delicious as normal. Molly Shannon is obnoxious and overacting through the entire thing. If you watch it for Steven and nothing else, as I did, it's pretty good.
I seen this on TV and thought it was funny. But also it  brings attention to how much we have to do everyday and how we and others can be affected by that.

You'll love this if you're a Molly Shannon fan.  The plot is average, production values are okay, the kids are cute and the humor is sometimes funny.  There's lots of Molly, though, which saves this rather average made-for-TV movie and makes it sparkle.
